question: Which UNESCO World Heritage Site is located in Bulguksa, Gyeongju, South Korea?
asked_question_translated: Situs Warisan Dunia UNESCO mana yang terletak di Bulguksa, Gyeongju, Korea Selatan?
answer: Situs Warisan Dunia UNESCO yang terletak di Bulguksa, Gyeongju, Korea Selatan adalah Kuil Bulguksa.
answer_translated_eng: A UNESCO World Heritage Site located in Bulguksa, Gyeongju, South Korea is the Bulguksa Temple.
